com.illcode.meterman.event

Interface DescriptionTextProcessor


  • public interface DescriptionTextProcessor
    A DescriptionTextProcessor is notified when the text that will be displayed for a Room or Entity description (via a Look command or entity selection) has been gathered and is ready for display in the UI.

    This mechanism can be used, for example, to humorous effect ("Through your mighty -8.00 diopter glasses you see..."), or to simulate status effects (ex. blanking out every 3rd character to simulate visual distress).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ENTITY_DESCRIPTION
      Constant indicating entity description text is ready.
      static int ROOM_DESCRIPTION
      Constant indicating room description text (aka Look text) is ready.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void descriptionTextReady(StringBuilder sb, int textType)
      Called when the text that will be shown for a description has been gathered and is about to be displayed.

    • Field Detail

      • ROOM_DESCRIPTION

        static final int ROOM_DESCRIPTION
        Constant indicating room description text (aka Look text) is ready.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ENTITY_DESCRIPTION

        static final int ENTITY_DESCRIPTION
        Constant indicating entity description text is ready.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • descriptionTextReady

        void descriptionTextReady(StringBuilder sb,
                        int textType)
        Called when the text that will be shown for a description has been gathered and is about to be displayed. The listener can affect the text shown by modifying the StringBuilder.
        Parameters:
        sb - StringBuilder holding the text to be shown
        textType - either ROOM_DESCRIPTION or ENTITY_DESCRIPTION, indicating at what point the method is being called.
